channel.description: Recent content in work on Arjun Srinivasan

item.title: Projects @ Dartmouth
item.description: Google Patents Classification Economics RA for Professor Ethan G. Lewis I’m working on matching patent and industry electricity-use datasets. Maze Algorithm in C Class project for CS 50 (“Software Design and Implementation”). Our algorithm solving an 8-player maze game Along with Boxian Wang, Michael Canche, and Daniel Diaz, I wrote a program in C that communicates with a game server and implemenents our own maze game solving algorithm based on the Floyd-Warshall algorithm and Dijkstra’s algorithm.
